activities.loc: Waushara Co. Courthouse 2nd Floor Room 230, Branch 1

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Peter Lawrence Handley

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.

21CF259 & 22CF79 Cases called @ 11:11 AM Defendant Peter Lawrence Handley in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott A Ceman in court for Peter Lawrence Handley.  Attorney Matthew R. Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. 21CF259 - Hearing to address the Motion to Introduce Pulizzano and Denny Evidence at Trial.   The State does not object. The Court grants the motion for reasons stated on the record. Atty Ceman requesting a FPT in 21CF259. The Court orders defense motions be filed by October 15, 2022. State's motions to be filed by no later than November 1, 2022. Final pre-trial scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
from the Court - Petition for investigator fees denied
Motion hearing on September 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.
NOT PUT OF RECORD: Attorney Scott A Ceman appeared by phone for Peter Lawrence Handley.  Attorney Dennis Ryan in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Ceman requesting a motion hearing.
Status conference on August 9, 2022 at 09:55 am.

21CF529 & 22CF79 Cases called @ 9:51 AM Defendant Peter Lawrence Handley in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott A Ceman in court for Peter Lawrence Handley.  Attorney Matthew R. Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. The Court raises a concern regarding the delay in appointment of counsel by SPD. Statement by Atty Ceman. Recess for counsel to discuss with his client. 10:06 AM case recalled. Same appearances. Atty Ceman advises that his client does not intend to file any motions regarding the jurisdictional issue. Complaints Stated - Advised of offense and potential punishment.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived. The Court entertains wavier of the preliminary hearing in both matters. The Court accepts voluntary waiver of the preliminary hearing. Defendant BOT. Information filed. Receipt admitted - Reading waived. NG plea entered as to all charges.  STC Scheduled - NOH Given.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.

21CF259 & 22CF79 cases called @ 2:19 PM Defendant Peter Lawrence Handley in court, in custody.  Attorney Matthew R. Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant has not yet been appointed counsel by SPD. The Court will appoint counsel. The Court finds good cause exists to adjourn the IA.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 27, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

Case called @ 1:31 PM Defendant Peter Lawrence Handley in court, in custody.  Attorney Matthew R. Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is eligible for SPD service, no counsel yet appointed. Court takes steps to attempt to secure SPD appointment.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 17, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Case called @ 1:35 PM Defendant Peter Lawrence Handley in court, in custody.  Attorney Wesley Kottke in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is eligible for SPD services but an attorney has not yet been appointed. The Court finds good cause exists to adjourn the IA to allow time for counsel to be appointed. 22CF79 - Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and potential punishment.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel. Defendant will be represented by SPD. Court orders $5000 Sig Bond.  AIA Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 17, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
